Subject: Does Enterprise Auditor Encrypt?
Description: To my knowledge Enterprise Auditor does not encrypt and of the data stored or data in transit but I'd like to confirm. Thank you.
What_We_Know__c:
+++++
Here are 2 articles where we do have HTTPS encryption:
 
FSAA Applet Certificate Management Overview

https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Admin/DataCollector/FSAA/CertificateManagement.htm


FSAA: Scan Settings

https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EnterpriseAuditor_11.6/page/Content/EnterpriseAuditor/Admin/DataCollector/FSAA/ScanSettings.htm


Communication between the FSAA proxy server and the target host may be encrypted.
We support encryption from the FSAA proxy server to the NEA Application server.
+++++
